programme.title: Falling for Vermont
programme.desc: A best-selling author who got amnesia as the result of a car accident finds refuge with the local doctor of a small idyllic town in Vermont.

programme.desc: The owner of a bookstore butts heads with an architect who plans on renovating the neighborhood.

programme.desc: Sophia's acerbic sister, whom she hasn't seen or talked to in 30 years, pays an unexpected visit.

programme.desc: Following his major surgery, Dorothy allows her ex-husband, Stan, to recuperate from it in her bedroom.

programme.desc: The roommates swoon over a TV actor Patrick Vaughn who is appearing at their community theater.

programme.desc: Deprived of Van's attention, Cheyenne develops a relationship with the father of her daughter's play date.

programme.desc: The roommates reminisce about the adventures they have shared.

programme.desc: Dorothy becomes romantically interested in Frank Leahy, a fellow teacher whom she later discovers is a priest.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Angela Petrillo pays a return visit to Miami, making her sister's life miserable.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: After attending a sorority reunion, Blanche considers having a face lift.

programme.title: A Summer to Remember
programme.desc: A doctor takes her teenage daughter to Fiji, hoping to reconnect and improve their relationship.

programme.title: The Wedding Veil Unveiled
programme.desc: Emma travels to Italy to research a wedding veil said to bring love to its owner. While there, she meets Paolo, the son of a local lace-making family.

programme.title: Her Pen Pal
programme.desc: An event planner can't wait to attend -- and plan -- her best friend's wedding in Paris. However, when she finds out her ex is bringing a date, she reconnects with her French childhood pen pal.

programme.title: Two Scoops of Italy
programme.desc: When an American chef travels to a quaint village in Italy, she falls in love with the flavors, the culture, and the gentleman who helped her discover it all.

programme.title: Autumn Dreams
programme.desc: Years after the annulment of their spontaneous marriage a couple discovers a mistake in the paperwork that means they are still husband and wife.

programme.title: Love of the Irish
programme.desc: Tired of bad luck, Fiona takes her mother on a trip to Ireland to turn things around. She soon meets a charming single father who helps her make her own luck.

programme.desc: One of Dorothy's pupils may face deportation, and she feels responsible.

programme.desc: Frasier's fear that he is entering middle age causes him to hesitate before asking out a young saleswoman.

programme.desc: Frasier travels to the wilds of Canada with Martin, Niles, Daphne and Eddie the dog.

programme.desc: Niles co-hosts on Frasier's show when the two collaborate on a text about sibling rivalry.

programme.desc: A Halloween prank against rival Gary (Robert Desiderio) at the Old Towne Tavern has serious consequences.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Carla fears that Boston Celtics forward Kevin McHale is turning into one of the bar bunch; Lilith gets a new hairdo.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Reba enters a beauty pageant for grandmothers, Barbra Jean becomes jealous and sets out to prove she is the true Grandma Hart.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba is thrilled when the city's hottest real estate agent wants to interview her for a job, until the woman shows up unannounced for a surprise meeting.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Kyra passes her driving test, Barbra Jean makes her sign a safety contract and provides her with a cell phone that contains a hidden GPS chip.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Brock volunteers to be a football coach and encourages Jake to try out for the team, so Reba persuades Van to train him for the tryouts.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche announces that she is canceling a date with her latest boyfriend, because he does not meet her standards.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy dismays when her daughter is too forgiving of her unfaithful husband.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: When two police officers set up surveillance equipment in Blanche's house, Dorothy, Rose, Blanche and Sophia are more interested in snaring the policemen.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Through a series of flashbacks, the housemates reminisce about their birthday celebrations.

programme.title: Royal Matchmaker
programme.desc: A struggling matchmaker is hired by a king to find his son a suitable wife in time for a national celebration. As the clock ticks toward the deadline, the matchmaker finds him the perfect wife -- only to realize that she's fallen in love with him.

programme.title: June in January
programme.desc: When her fiance (Wes Brown) receives a job offer, a woman (Brooke D'Orsay) must suddenly plan her wedding in three weeks.

programme.title: The Baker's Son
programme.desc: Matt's passion transforms his bread from bland to brilliant. However, when the bread loses its magic, the island locals panic and turn to Annie -- Matt's childhood friend and true love -- for help.

programme.title: The Presence of Love
programme.desc: An adjunct professor bonds with a single father after traveling to England to visit the farm where her late mother grew up.

programme.title: Sweeter Than Chocolate
programme.desc: A local chocolatier is rumored to have the secret recipe to finding true love on Valentine's Day, drawing in a television reporter to investigate.

programme.title: A Country Wedding
programme.desc: Sparks fly when an engaged country-music star (Jesse Metcalfe) reconnects with a childhood friend (Autumn Reeser).
